sqlMap.statement:
SELECT * FROM
T07_NBS_RBIF
T07_NBS_RBIF_UH
T07_NBS_RBIF
WHERE REPORTKEY=#reportkey#

SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.FINM,A.FIRC,A.FICD,A.STCR,A.SSDG,A.TKMS,A.SSDS,A.CTTN,A.TTNM,A.RPNM,A.RPDT,B.VALIDATE_IND,B.INVALID_DT,B.REPORT_STATUS_CD,B.CREATE_ORG ,B.APPLICATION_NUM FROM
T07_NBS_RBIF A ,T07_REPORT B
T07_NBS_RBIF_UH A ,T07_REPORT_UH B
T07_NBS_RBIF A ,T07_REPORT B
WHERE A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY
A.REPORTKEY =#reportkey#
UPDATE T07_NBS_RBIF SET SSDG=#ssdg#,TKMS=#tkms#,SSDS=#ssds# WHERE REPORTKEY=#reportkey#

SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.FINM,A.FIRC,A.FICD,A.STCR,A.SSDG,A.TKMS,A.SSDS,A.CTTN,A.TTNM,A.RPNM,A.RPDT,B.VALIDATE_IND,B.INVALID_DT,B.REPORT_STATUS_CD,B.CREATE_ORG ,B.APPLICATION_NUM FROM T07_NBS_RBIF A ,T07_REPORT B ,T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP C WHERE B.CREATE_ORG=C.ORGANKEY AND A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY AND (B.RESEND_IND!='1' OR B.RESEND_IND IS NULL) AND B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD IN('N','A')
A.REPORTKEY =#reportkey#
B.CREATE_ORG=#create_org#
C.REPORT_ORGANKEY IN (SELECT REPORT_ORGANKEY FROM T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY=#organkey# )
B.RESEND_IND=#resend_ind#
B.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
B.INVALID_DT < #time:DATE#
B.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
B.CREATE_ORG in $org_ids$
A.RPDT >= #rpdt_start:DATE#
A.RPDT <= #rpdt_end:DATE#
ORDER BY A.REPORTKEY
ORDER BY A.RPDT
ORDER BY B.CREATE_ORG
DESC

SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.FINM,A.FIRC,A.FICD,A.STCR,A.SSDG,A.TKMS,A.SSDS,A.CTTN,A.TTNM,A.RPNM,A.RPDT,B.VALIDATE_IND,B.INVALID_DT,B.REPORT_STATUS_CD,B.CREATE_ORG ,B.APPLICATION_NUM FROM T07_NBS_RBIF A ,T07_REPORT B,T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP C WHERE B.CREATE_ORG=C.ORGANKEY AND A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY AND (B.RESEND_IND != '1' OR B.RESEND_IND IS NULL)
A.REPORTKEY =#reportkey#
A.SSDG =#ssdg#
B.CREATE_ORG=#create_org#
C.REPORT_ORGANKEY IN (SELECT REPORT_ORGANKEY FROM T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY=#organkey# )
B.RESEND_IND=#resend_ind#
B.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
B.INVALID_DT >= #time:DATE#
B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD = #pbc_msg_type_cd#
B.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
B.CREATE_ORG in $org_ids$
A.RPDT >= #rpdt_start:DATE#
A.RPDT <= #rpdt_end:DATE#
ORDER BY A.REPORTKEY
ORDER BY A.RPDT
ORDER BY B.CREATE_ORG
DESC

SELECT COUNT( A.REPORTKEY) FROM T07_NBS_RBIF A,T07_REPORT B,T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP C WHERE B.CREATE_ORG=C.ORGANKEY AND A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY AND (B.RESEND_IND != '1' OR B.RESEND_IND IS NULL)
A.SSDG =#ssdg#
A.REPORTKEY LIKE #reportkey#
B.CREATE_ORG=#create_org#
C.REPORT_ORGANKEY IN (SELECT REPORT_ORGANKEY FROM T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY=#organkey# )
B.RESEND_IND=#resend_ind#
B.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
B.INVALID_DT >= #time:DATE#
B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD = #pbc_msg_type_cd#
B.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
B.CREATE_ORG IN $org_ids$
A.RPDT >= #rpdt_start:DATE#
A.RPDT <= #rpdt_end:DATE#

SELECT COUNT(A.REPORTKEY) FROM T07_NBS_RBIF A ,T07_REPORT B ,T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP C WHERE B.CREATE_ORG=C.ORGANKEY AND A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY AND (B.RESEND_IND!='1' OR B.RESEND_IND IS NULL) AND B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD IN('N','A')
A.REPORTKEY LIKE #reportkey#
B.CREATE_ORG=#create_org#
C.REPORT_ORGANKEY IN (SELECT REPORT_ORGANKEY FROM T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY=#organkey# )
B.RESEND_IND=#resend_ind#
B.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
B.INVALID_DT < #time:DATE#
B.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
B.CREATE_ORG IN $org_ids$
A.RPDT >= #rpdt_start:DATE#
A.RPDT <= #rpdt_end:DATE#

SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.FINM,A.FIRC,A.FICD,A.STCR,A.SSDG,A.TKMS,A.SSDS,A.CTTN,A.TTNM,A.RPNM,A.RPDT,B.VALIDATE_IND,B.INVALID_DT,B.REPORT_STATUS_CD,B.CREATE_ORG ,B.ORIG_APPLICATION_NUM AS APPLICATION_NUM FROM T07_NBS_RBIF A ,T07_REPORT B ,T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP C WHERE B.CREATE_ORG=C.ORGANKEY AND A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY AND B.RESEND_IND='1'
A.REPORTKEY =#reportkey#
B.CREATE_ORG=#create_org#
C.REPORT_ORGANKEY IN (SELECT REPORT_ORGANKEY FROM T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY=#organkey# )
B.RESEND_IND=#resend_ind#
B.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD = #pbc_msg_type_cd#
B.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
B.CREATE_ORG in $org_ids$
A.RPDT >= #rpdt_start:DATE#
A.RPDT <= #rpdt_end:DATE#
ORDER BY A.REPORTKEY
ORDER BY A.RPDT
ORDER BY B.CREATE_ORG
DESC

SELECT COUNT(A.REPORTKEY) FROM T07_NBS_RBIF A ,T07_REPORT B,T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP C WHERE B.CREATE_ORG=C.ORGANKEY AND A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY AND B.RESEND_IND='1'
A.REPORTKEY LIKE #reportkey#
B.CREATE_ORG=#create_org#
C.REPORT_ORGANKEY IN (SELECT REPORT_ORGANKEY FROM T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY=#organkey# )
B.RESEND_IND=#resend_ind#
B.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD = #pbc_msg_type_cd#
B.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
B.CREATE_ORG IN $org_ids$
A.RPDT >= #rpdt_start:DATE#
A.RPDT <= #rpdt_end:DATE#

SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.FINM,A.FIRC,A.FICD,A.STCR,A.SSDG,A.TKMS,A.SSDS,A.CTTN,A.TTNM,A.RPNM,A.RPDT,B.VALIDATE_IND,B.INVALID_DT,B.REPORT_STATUS_CD,B.CREATE_ORG ,B.ORIG_APPLICATION_NUM AS ORIG_APPLICATION_NUM, B.APPLICATION_NUM AS APPLICATION_NUM FROM T07_NBS_RBIF A ,T07_REPORT B ,T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP C WHERE B.CREATE_ORG=C.ORGANKEY AND A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY
A.REPORTKEY =#reportkey#
B.CREATE_ORG=#create_org#
C.REPORT_ORGANKEY IN (SELECT REPORT_ORGANKEY FROM T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY=#organkey# )
B.RESEND_IND=#resend_ind#
B.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD = #pbc_msg_type_cd#
B.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
B.CREATE_ORG in $org_ids$
A.RPDT >= #rpdt_start:DATE#
A.RPDT <= #rpdt_end:DATE#
ORDER BY A.REPORTKEY
ORDER BY A.RPDT
ORDER BY B.CREATE_ORG
DESC

SELECT COUNT(A.REPORTKEY) FROM T07_NBS_RBIF A ,T07_REPORT B,T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP C WHERE B.CREATE_ORG=C.ORGANKEY AND A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY
A.REPORTKEY LIKE #reportkey#
B.CREATE_ORG=#create_org#
C.REPORT_ORGANKEY IN (SELECT REPORT_ORGANKEY FROM T07_REPORT_ORGAN_MAP WHERE ORGANKEY=#organkey# )
B.RESEND_IND=#resend_ind#
B.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD = #pbc_msg_type_cd#
B.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
B.CREATE_ORG IN $org_ids$
A.RPDT >= #rpdt_start:DATE#
A.RPDT <= #rpdt_end:DATE#

select * from( SELECT C.CSNM,'0' as report_time_cd, A.REPORTKEY,A.FINM,A.FIRC,A.FICD,A.STCR,A.SSDG,A.TKMS,A.SSDS,A.CTTN,A.TTNM,A.RPNM,A.RPDT,B.VALIDATE_IND,B.INVALID_DT,B.REPORT_STATUS_CD,B.CREATE_ORG ,B.APPLICATION_NUM FROM T07_NBS_RBIF A ,T07_REPORT B,T07_NBS_CTIF C WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY AND A.REPORTKEY = C.REPORTKEY
C.CSNM =#csnm#
EXISTS(SELECT 'X' FROM T07_NBS_ATIF D WHERE A.REPORTKEY = D.REPORTKEY AND D.CTAC =#ctac#)
E.CRTP =#crtp#
A.REPORTKEY =#reportkey#
A.SSDG =#ssdg#
B.CREATE_ORG=#create_org#
B.RESEND_IND=#resend_ind#
B.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
B.INVALID_DT >= #time:DATE#
B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD = #pbc_msg_type_cd#
B.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
AND B.REPORT_STATUS_CD IN('4','5','6')
B.CREATE_ORG in $org_ids$
A.RPDT >= #rpdt_start:DATE#
A.RPDT <= #rpdt_end:DATE#
UNION ALL SELECT C.CSNM,'1' as report_time_cd, A.REPORTKEY,A.FINM,A.FIRC,A.FICD,A.STCR,A.SSDG,A.TKMS,A.SSDS,A.CTTN,A.TTNM,A.RPNM,A.RPDT,B.VALIDATE_IND,B.INVALID_DT,B.REPORT_STATUS_CD,B.CREATE_ORG ,B.APPLICATION_NUM FROM T07_NBS_RBIF_UH A ,T07_REPORT_UH B,T07_NBS_CTIF_UH C WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY AND A.REPORTKEY = C.REPORTKEY
C.CSNM =#csnm#
EXISTS(SELECT 'X' FROM T07_NBS_ATIF_UH D WHERE A.REPORTKEY = D.REPORTKEY AND D.CTAC =#ctac#)
E.CRTP =#crtp#
A.REPORTKEY =#reportkey#
A.SSDG =#ssdg#
B.CREATE_ORG=#create_org#
B.RESEND_IND=#resend_ind#
B.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
B.INVALID_DT >= #time:DATE#
B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD = #pbc_msg_type_cd#
B.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
AND B.REPORT_STATUS_CD IN('4','5','6')
B.CREATE_ORG in $org_ids$
A.RPDT >= #rpdt_start:DATE#
A.RPDT <= #rpdt_end:DATE#
)t
ORDER BY t.REPORTKEY
ORDER BY t.RPDT
ORDER BY t.CREATE_ORG
DESC

SELECT COUNT(REPORTKEY) FROM ((SELECT A.REPORTKEY FROM T07_NBS_RBIF A,T07_REPORT B,T07_NBS_CTIF C WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY AND A.REPORTKEY = C.REPORTKEY
C.CSNM =#csnm#
EXISTS(SELECT 'X' FROM T07_NBS_ATIF D WHERE A.REPORTKEY = D.REPORTKEY AND D.CTAC =#ctac#)
E.CRTP =#crtp#
A.SSDG =#ssdg#
A.REPORTKEY LIKE #reportkey#
B.CREATE_ORG=#create_org#
B.RESEND_IND=#resend_ind#
B.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
B.INVALID_DT >= #time:DATE#
B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD = #pbc_msg_type_cd#
B.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
AND B.REPORT_STATUS_CD IN('4','5','6')
B.CREATE_ORG IN $org_ids$
A.RPDT >= #rpdt_start:DATE#
A.RPDT <= #rpdt_end:DATE#
) UNION ALL (SELECT A.REPORTKEY FROM T07_NBS_RBIF_UH A,T07_REPORT_UH B,T07_NBS_CTIF_UH C WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY AND A.REPORTKEY = C.REPORTKEY
C.CSNM =#csnm#
EXISTS(SELECT 'X' FROM T07_NBS_ATIF_UH D WHERE A.REPORTKEY = D.REPORTKEY AND D.CTAC =#ctac#)
E.CRTP =#crtp#
A.SSDG =#ssdg#
A.REPORTKEY LIKE #reportkey#
B.CREATE_ORG=#create_org#
B.RESEND_IND=#resend_ind#
B.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
B.INVALID_DT >= #time:DATE#
B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD = #pbc_msg_type_cd#
B.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
AND B.REPORT_STATUS_CD IN('4','5','6')
B.CREATE_ORG IN $org_ids$
A.RPDT >= #rpdt_start:DATE#
A.RPDT <= #rpdt_end:DATE#
))T

(SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.FINM,A.FIRC,A.FICD,A.STCR,A.SSDG,A.TKMS,A.SSDS,A.CTTN,A.TTNM,A.RPNM,A.RPDT,B.VALIDATE_IND,B.INVALID_DT,B.REPORT_STATUS_CD,B.CREATE_ORG ,B.APPLICATION_NUM FROM T07_NBS_RBIF A ,T07_REPORT B WHERE A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY
A.REPORTKEY =#reportkey#
B.CREATE_ORG=#create_org#
B.RESEND_IND=#resend_ind#
B.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
B.INVALID_DT >= #time:DATE#
B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD = #pbc_msg_type_cd#
B.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
AND B.REPORT_STATUS_CD IN('4','5','6')
B.CREATE_ORG in $org_ids$
A.RPDT >= #rpdt_start:DATE#
A.RPDT <= #rpdt_end:DATE#
ORDER BY A.REPORTKEY
ORDER BY A.RPDT
ORDER BY B.CREATE_ORG
DESC
) UNION ALL (SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.FINM,A.FIRC,A.FICD,A.STCR,A.SSDG,A.TKMS,A.SSDS,A.CTTN,A.TTNM,A.RPNM,A.RPDT,B.VALIDATE_IND,B.INVALID_DT,B.REPORT_STATUS_CD,B.CREATE_ORG ,B.APPLICATION_NUM FROM T07_NBS_RBIF_UH A ,T07_REPORT_UH B WHERE A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY
A.REPORTKEY =#reportkey#
B.CREATE_ORG=#create_org#
B.RESEND_IND=#resend_ind#
B.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
B.INVALID_DT >= #time:DATE#
B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD = #pbc_msg_type_cd#
B.REPORT_STATUS_CD = #report_status_cd#
AND B.REPORT_STATUS_CD IN('4','5','6')
B.CREATE_ORG in $org_ids$
A.RPDT >= #rpdt_start:DATE#
A.RPDT <= #rpdt_end:DATE#
ORDER BY A.REPORTKEY
ORDER BY A.RPDT
ORDER BY B.CREATE_ORG
DESC
)
